Section2.title: Let your clinic open its doors to the UK!
Section2.p1: Alpha Ashley Consulting is a consultancy company offering end-to-end health tourism services to healthcare institutions.
Section2.p2: It manages all processes from training sales staff in health tourism to establishing the institution's presence in digital media; from determining advertising strategies to managing ads on social media and search engines (SEO).
Section2.p3: Unlike other consultancy companies, it guarantees an increase in patient numbers and clinic awareness by offering dental meetings with your international patients through its experienced sales team.
Section2.p4: Contact us now for more information.

article1.title: The Most Wonderful Holiday City of 2023: Antalya
article1.description: In recent years, Turkey has gained increasing popularity in health tourism. With its natural beauty, historical richness, and high-quality healthcare services, Turkey attracts health tourists from all over the world. So what does Turkey offer in health tourism and what are the government incentives? Here's more info:..

article2.title: Health Tourism in Turkey: A Treasure Waiting to Be Discovered
article2.description: Known for its rich cultural heritage hosting many civilizations, Turkey has recently been drawing attention in health tourism as well. What is the potential in this field, and why has Turkey become a preferred destination?..

article3.title: Discovering Antalya: A Health Destination
article3.description: Located along the stunning Mediterranean coastline, Antalya stands out not only with its breathtaking beauty but also with the various health and wellness experiences it offers for those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. Here's why Antalya is a health...

Footer.highlight: With your Health Tourism authorization certificate, now is the perfect time to open your clinic’s doors to the UK! Alpha Ashley Consulting offers you the opportunity to reach your patients in the UK directly through face-to-face meetings.
Footer.formSubtitle: Fill out the form and contact now

AboutPage.title: ABOUT US
AboutPage.description: Alpha Ashley Consulting is a leading organization offering strategic consultancy services to companies operating in the healthcare sector. Specializing in health tourism, our company focuses on increasing our clients' success by providing innovative solutions and the most up-to-date knowledge in the industry. Our experienced team closely follows the dynamics of the global healthcare market and offers strategic guidance, market research, competitive analysis, and operational support through a customer-centric approach. Alpha Ashley Consulting aims to enhance its clients’ competitive advantage by delivering fast and effective solutions tailored to the changing needs of the sector. If you want your clinic to directly reach potential patients in the UK and Europe where advertising is often insufficient, we invite you to schedule a meeting today. Learn more about our dental meeting packages for your clinic.

HealthTourismPage.title: Health Tourism
HealthTourismPage.description: Health tourism is a rapidly growing form of travel and treatment that is increasingly preferred by people around the world. At Alpha Ashley Consulting, we provide consultancy services in areas such as strategic planning, market research, and operational support for facilities, hospitals, clinics, and healthcare providers operating in the health tourism sector. Our solutions are designed to increase our clients' competitiveness in international markets, reach their target audiences, and deliver high-quality healthcare services effectively. With our experience and expertise in the health tourism industry, we work to help our clients succeed and support them in seizing future growth and opportunities in this field.

HumanResourcesPage.title: Human Resources
HumanResourcesPage.description: At Alpha Ashley Consulting, we help companies manage their talent management processes in the most effective way through the human resources services we offer. With our people-oriented approach, we aim to match the right candidates with the right positions and increase employee satisfaction and productivity. We tailor our HR strategies to the specific needs of each company and provide solutions that support long-term success.
HumanResourcesPage.note: You can send your CV to

ServicesPage.meetingP1: With the Full Package Meeting Program, Alpha Ashley Consulting offers you the opportunity to meet your patients abroad and make quality sales. With our expert team in health tourism, we open the doors of your clinic to Europe!
ServicesPage.meetingP2: - Arrangement of hotels for meetings in the UK and Europe
ServicesPage.meetingP3: - Support from native English-speaking expert sales personnel in health tourism
ServicesPage.meetingP4: - Best representation and promotion of your clinic
ServicesPage.meetingP5: - We prepare all legal documents and files. Contact us for more details.
ServicesPage.salesP1: Alpha Ashley is a pioneering consulting company focusing on the training of sales personnel in the healthcare industry. The company is managed by a team specialized in healthcare sales operations.
ServicesPage.salesP2: Alpha Ashley provides tailored solutions to ensure the best training for healthcare organizations’ sales staff. The company helps them adopt a customer-oriented approach and develop effective communication strategies to increase satisfaction.
ServicesPage.salesP3: Its clients include hospitals, clinics, and healthcare centers. The company designs training programs based on a thorough research and analysis process tailored to each client’s needs.
ServicesPage.salesP4: As a company specializing in sales training for the healthcare sector, Alpha Ashley works to maximize client success by offering customized solutions to enhance staff performance and drive business growth.
ServicesPage.marketingP1: Alpha Ashley offers expert digital marketing consultancy services to organizations in the healthcare sector. It supports clients in designing, managing, and optimizing ad campaigns on social media platforms, and managing Google Ads. The company provides customized solutions to maximize the success of digital marketing strategies.
ServicesPage.marketingP2: Alpha Ashley's healthcare client portfolio is extensive, including hospitals, clinics, and other medical institutions. It works to design customized solutions that increase the success of their marketing strategies.
ServicesPage.promotionP1: Alpha Ashley is a versatile consulting company that also offers advertising consultancy services to healthcare organizations. It helps clients promote their brand locally and internationally through TV, public transport, radio, magazines, and newspapers. The expert team provides support in planning and executing ad campaigns with the most effective strategies.
